# vfs_setmaxsymlen

**Function**

Set the maximum length of a symbolic link on a filesystem.

## Declaration

```swift
void vfs_setmaxsymlen(mount_t mp, uint32_t symlen);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount on which to set symlink length cap.
- **symlen**: Length to set.

## Return Value

Max symlink length.
